channel.title: apache on Tsing Wind - 清风徐来 水波不兴
channel.description: Recent content in apache on Tsing Wind - 清风徐来 水波不兴

item.title: apache开启websocket反向代理
item.description: 环境 Mac OS X 10.12.4 Apache/2.4.25 (Unix) 配置 httpd.conf配置，开启代理模块 1 2 3 4 LoadModule proxy_module libexec/apache2/mod_proxy.so LoadModule proxy_wstunnel_module libexec/apache2/mod_proxy_wstunnel.so ## mod_proxy_balancer负载均衡模块可选，不开也

item.title: apache Authorization headers
item.description: 来源于stackoverflow Various Apache modules will strip the Authorization header, usually for “security reasons”. They all have different obscure settings you can tweak to overrule this behaviour, but you’ll need to determine exactly which module is to blame. You can work around this issue by passing the header directly to PHP via the env: SetEnvIf Authorization
